item.description:
The newest Toys N Things meetup is to give players a chance to check out the Players Handbook III while trying to prevent a rift to the Far Realms from expanding further on the mortal world. Thanks to events like the Dawn War the wards which protect the mortal world from the effects of the Far Realms have been weakened. So strange beings are now being seen near the town of Beorunnaâ€™s Well and a place called The Lonely Tower. The locals have sent two expeditions to the tower to find out what is happening, but both did not return.
So the locals are now putting out calls for powerful adventurers to investigate what is going on at the tower and stop it if they can. Beneath the Lonely Tower is a scenario for 6th level characters and characters will be provided for those players who who don't have a character of their own.
In addition to running Beneath the Lonely Tower, we will also be demoing the D&D Encounters: Undermountain. D&D Encounters is WotC's new program of weekly scenarios designed for those who want to play D&D, but can't devote the time to play a full four to six hour game. WotC designed D&D:Encounters for both new and experienced players who want to play in as series of short adventures, but might not be able to attend every session.
